description: Dashboard for monitoring Harness FF Proxy

panels.description: Shows which SDKs are using the ff-proxy
panels.title: SDK Usage

panels.description: Shows the rate of metrics being forwarded from the Primary Proxy to Harness Saas and if errors are occuring
panels.title: Metrics Forwarded

panels.description: Shows the rate of requests that the Proxy makes to the ff-client-service in Harness SaaS summed by URL
panels.title: Requests to Harness Saas

panels.description: Shows SSE Events being received by the Primary Proxy
panels.title: Harness Saas -> Primary SSE Events

panels.description: Shows SSE Events being forwarded from the Primary Proxy to SDKs. Note this will show data even if you have no SDKs connected to the Primary Proxy
panels.title: Primary Proxy-> SDKs

panels.description: Shows SSE events being forwarded from the Primary Proxy to Read Replica Proxy's
panels.title: Primary Proxy -> Read Replica Proxy

panels.description: Shows SSE events being received by Read Replica Proxy's
panels.title: Read Replica Proxy Events Received

panels.description: Shows SSE events being forwarded by Read Replica Proxy's to SDKs
panels.title: Read Replica -> SDK

panels.description: Show the number of successful and unsuccessful writes to the cache
panels.title: Cache Writes

panels.description: Shows the number of successful and failed reads made to the cache
panels.title: Cache Reads

title: FF Proxy V2
